role.description: The user's role in the organization.

department.description: The department the user belongs to.

country.description: The country the user is located in.

branch.description: The specific branch or office the user works from.

chatMessage.title: Chat Message
chatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a chat conversation.

activeChats.title: Active Chats
activeChats.description: A document to track which chat conversations are active.

todo.title: To-Do Item
todo.description: Represents a single to-do item or task for a user.

name.description: The name or title of the task.

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

duration.description: The duration of the task in seconds.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this task.

report.title: Performance Report
report.description: A performance report generated by a user.

content.description: The full content of the report.

date.description: The date the report was created.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created this report.

marketingContent.title: Marketing Content
marketingContent.description: Represents an AI-generated and approved piece of marketing content.

client.title: SaaS Client
client.description: Represents a single SaaS client who signed up through the wizard.

adminProfile.title: Admin Profile
adminProfile.description: Represents a super administrator of the SaaS platform.

/chats/{userId}.description: Document tracking active chat IDs for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/todos/{todoId}.description: Stores to-do items for a specific user.

/users/{userId}/reports/{reportId}.description: Stores performance reports for a specific user.

/clientLeads/{leadId}.description: Stores all client leads for the organization.

/clients/{clientId}.description: Stores documents for each SaaS client.
